LanguageData.PA_DisconnectedGeneratorEnabled_Descript: Determines if an alert should be shown when a generator is not connected to any power consumers.
LanguageData.PA_LowFuelGeneratorEnabled_Description: Determines if an alert should be shown when a generator is low on fuel.
LanguageData.PA_LowFuelGeneratorThresholdSeconds_Desc: If the time left in realtime seconds for a fueled generator to provide power is less than this value, the alert will be shown.
LanguageData.PA_DrainingBatteriesEnabled_Description: Determines if an alert should be shown when batteries are close to draining out.
LanguageData.PA_ShortCircuitRiskEnabled_Description: Determines if an alert should be shown when buildings are unroofed and prone to short circuiting in the rain.
LanguageData.PA_WastingFuelGeneratorEnabled_Descripti: Determines if an alert should be shown when a fueled generator is producing purely excessive power.
LanguageData.PA_ObstructedSolarEnabled_Description: Determines if an alert should be shown when a solar generator is obstructed by a roofed tile, reducing it's power output.
LanguageData.PA_ObstructedWindEnabled_Description: Determines if an alert should be shown when a wind turbine is obstructed by a roofed tile or tall object, reducing it's power output.
LanguageData.PA_ObstructedWaterEnabled_Description: Determines if an alert should be shown when a waterwheel generator is obstructed by another waterwheel generator or non-moving water, reducing it's power output.
LanguageData.PA_DrainingBatteriesThresholdSeconds_Des: If the time left in realtime seconds for batteries to provide power is less than this value, the alert will be shown.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_DisconnectedGenerator_Descripti: Generator is currently not connected to any active power grid.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_DisconnectedGenerators_Descript: {0} generators are currently not connected to any active power grid.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_LowFuelGenerator_Low_Descriptio: Generator will run out of fuel in {0:0.00} seconds.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_DrainingBatteries_Draining_Desc: Batteries will run out of power in {0:0.00} seconds.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_ShortCircuitRisk_Description: Unroofed building at risk of short circuit in the rain.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_ShortCircuitRisks_Description: {0} unroofed buildings at risk of short circuit in the rain.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_GeneratorWastingFuel_Descriptio: Generator is wasting fuel generating excess power.
LanguageData.PA_Alert_ObstructedGenerator_Description: Generator is obstructed and producing power at a reduced rate.
